Name: Livadeia
Description: The capital of Boeotia, known for its historical significance and natural beauty.

Name: Aliartos-Thespies
Description: A municipality that includes the historic areas of Aliartos and Thespies.

Name: Distomo-Arachova-Antikyra
Description: A municipality known for the picturesque town of Arachova and the historic sites of Distomo and Antikyra.

Name: Thebes
Description: An ancient city with a rich mythological and historical heritage.

Name: Orchomenos
Description: A historic town with archaeological significance in Boeotia.

Name: Tanagra
Description: A municipality known for its strategic location and historical importance.
